name: Construction Truck JCB Games
description:
Build your own city in this build city construction game. Drive heavy cars to load work cement or other city constructing things. Take a start from constructing houses and then move forward to the big buildings. The architects have so many projects to do that’s why they have chosen you. The trucks will surely make your construction easy and you will wind up your work before the time.

Drive big vehicles like bulldozers, cranes, excavators, and extra to carry your heavy materials. Lots of challenging construction missions are waiting for you. Building your own house and city is a dream of almost every boy. Do bodybuilders get themselves ready to build extremely beautiful and big cities in the town. All heavy materials of construction are here. Then what are you waiting for? All construction material is with you to call your big vehicles and take them to the construction site. Use the following vehicles to make your work much easier.

Work of crane:
Crane will help you in lifting extremely heavy amounts of weight with the hoist rope on it. So take help from cranes to lift your heavy materials in the building of bridges, roads, etc. try to use cranes only for heavy lifting.

Bulldozer is used for:
Bulldozers are mostly used for digging, ditching, and transportation of material. This vehicle will be used more. Boys use this vehicle more in your construction site.

Excavators:
This construction will help you remove heavy rocks, amount of soil, and cement. Dig big holes for your houses using excavators.

These heavy and big vehicles are going to help a lot. Build big buildings and commercial areas in your town and become the best constructor. use your skills and creative ideas to build an attractive city.

Your good creative ideas and efforts will bring more clients and you receive more orders for construction. Unlock every level bypassing the previous level.

Boys you also have an option of restart if your vehicle is stuck or you place your construction material in the wrong place, restart your level and do nicely this time.

Kill your boredom and learn some new things about construction by playing this build construction simulator and implement your unique creative ideas in building the city.
